1502820.name: Probably Tuesday
1502820.description:
The story of Probably Tuesday focuses on detective called Robert Lovell going around yet another typical tuesday (probably) of saving neighbors cat and finding grandmothers wallet. Then suddenly he gets contacted by femme fatale called Anne Gony about her husband Michael cheating her. So Robert takes his pistol maria and our suspenseful story begins.. Where will this journey take Robert?

Probably Tuesday is first person shooter adventure detective game.

You go around the levels in search of way forward and options to overcome enemies. Story unfolds as you advance through levels. Action is seen from the eyes of our detective, you the player. You have guns and must follow clues to find the way. Do you know the way?

Probably Tuesday is originally mod for Max Payne. And it is made for current gen mechanics and graphics by Ataverti studio with the Unity game engine.

Probably Tuesday features theme song by Liz Katrin and music by Harry Critchley.
1502820.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
